title: LF members to join Team Crushers [Alpha]!
body:
Creating  ranked Team, need players immediately. 
this can be a casual team for fun but id like to see how far we can take it!
I'm b3 just about in promos, i can play all lanes really well, but prefer midlane and jungle, because i can roam to help my team better. 
i'll give up those lanes if its for the benefit of the team but id like to get team mates that can fill the other roles! 
fill this out and i'll add you in game!
summoner name:
Age:
preferred role:
Favourite champion(s):
Current rank(not so important):
Thanks for reeding.

P.s. My new IGN is Jewency! don't be offended, i'm just a jew. :)
